title: AI testing
content:
Unify Management: Merge these three into a single management system inside the admin panel.

Sync with User Side: Ensure any changes made in the admin panel are automatically synced and reflected on the user side in real time.

Remove Redundancy: Remove duplicate or unwanted functionality across these three modules while keeping only the useful parts.

Preserve Existing Features: Make sure no existing useful functionality is lost, and other parts of the system remain unaffected.

UI/UX: The final solution should look professional, modern, and aligned with our theme (Blue, Orange, White) without mixing colors unnecessarily.

Efficiency: Optimize Supabase queries and API calls so it remains lightweight, even under free tier usage.

Deliverable: Provide updated React components and admin panel logic that unify and manage all three modules in one place, with proper synchronization to the user side.

üëâ This clearly tells the AI/dev:

You already have all 3 working.

You want one place to manage them.

Sync should work instantly.

No unwanted extra features.

UI should remain professional and on-brand.

Do you want me to also add role-based access control in this prompt (so only Admin/Super Admin can manage these unified sections)? That way, your admin panel stays

title: This Send Mail Token serves as your API key for authenticating API requests to ZeptoMail.
content:
To create an API key for ZeptoMail, follow these steps:

Log in to ZeptoMail: Access your ZeptoMail account at https://www.zoho.com/zeptomail/
.

Navigate to Mail Agents: In the left-hand panel, click on Mail Agents.

Select a Mail Agent: Choose the Mail Agent you wish to use for your application.

Access Setup Info: Within the selected Mail Agent, click on the Setup Info tab.

Generate or Copy Send Mail Token:

Click on the gear icon (‚öôÔ∏è) in the top-right section.

Under the API tab, you'll find the Send Mail Token.

You can either copy the existing token or generate a new one by clicking the "Generate New" button. 
Zoho

This Send Mail Token serves as your API key for authenticating API requests to ZeptoMail.

For detailed information on using ZeptoMail's API to send transactional emails, refer to the official documentation: 
Zoho
.

If you need assistance with integrating ZeptoMail's API into your application or have further questions, feel free to ask!

title: Trust & clarity: Expiry info, disclaimer, and support email at the bottom.
content:
Key Design Choices:

Brand colors: Orange (#ff7a18) + Blue (#1e3a8a) from your theme for a sharp, modern feel.

Clean layout: Centered container, soft shadows, rounded corners ‚Üí professional SaaS vibe.

Mobile friendly: Simple table layout + scalable font sizes.

Action-focused CTA: A single, high-contrast button (orange on white).

Trust & clarity: Expiry info, disclaimer, and support email at the bottom.

Do you want me to add a TestingVala logo at the top (instead of text branding), so it looks even more polished like other SaaS welcome emails?

title: Produce an AMP or MJML version for transactional email providers.
content:
Done ‚Äî I created a live email preview runner titled "Testing Vala Magic Link ‚Äî Preview" in the canvas.
Open that preview to see the rendered email (with a sample magic link and expiry). Use the runner controls to change the link or expiry and click Render preview or Open in new tab to inspect it in isolation.

If you'd like, I can:

Add your SVG logo to the header,

Export a standalone .html file for download,

Produce an AMP or MJML version for transactional email providers.

Which one next?

title: gvhbh
content:
Job Description ‚Äì QA Engineer (Automation Testing)
Position Overview

We are seeking a highly skilled QA Engineer (Automation Testing) to join our team and ensure the quality, reliability, and performance of our Resume Builder and Applicant Tracking System (ATS) platform. The QA Engineer will be responsible for designing, developing, and executing automated test scripts, maintaining test frameworks, and collaborating with developers, product managers, and other QA team members to deliver a seamless user experience.

Key Responsibilities

Design, develop, and maintain automation test frameworks for web and API testing (preferably using Playwright/Selenium/Cypress + TypeScript/Java).

Create, execute, and optimize automated test scripts to validate functionality, UI, and workflows in the resume builder and ATS modules.

Collaborate with the product and development teams to understand requirements, acceptance criteria, and business workflows.

Perform functional, regression, smoke, and integration testing across multiple browsers and devices.

Validate end-to-end flows such as resume creation, parsing, ATS compatibility checks, job posting, candidate search, and application tracking.

title: Todays API testing
content:
Things You Can Do

Check Activity Monitor (Cmd + Space ‚Üí Activity Monitor)
‚Üí Sort by CPU and Energy to see which apps are consuming the most.

Close unnecessary apps/tabs ‚Äì especially Chrome & heavy IDE plugins.

Use Safari instead of Chrome for web debugging (lighter on M1).

Restart occasionally to clear processes.

Elevate the laptop or use a cooling pad for airflow.

Update macOS & Xcode/VS Code ‚Äì updates often improve performance and reduce heat.

‚ö° Extra Tip for Developers

If you‚Äôre running Docker or Android Emulator, they are very resource-hungry on M1 ‚Üí try lightweight alternatives like Colima (for Docker) or test on a real device.

If coding in VS Code, disable unused extensions.

üëâ Can you tell me what exactly you were coding (e.g., React Native, Playwright automation, backend server, etc.) when it started heating? That way I can suggest more targeted fixes.
